Video Games by

Emanuel Acosta

(Emanvidmaker)


Emanuel Acosta is a Gameplay Programmer. He likes to compete in game jams and has been making games since he was 11 years old. He specializes in Unity but has experience with Unreal and Godot. In the future he wants to make his own Game Studio. Aside from programming hes a science nerd and loves physics.

Emanuel Acosta is a Gameplay Programmer. He likes to compete in game jams and has been making games since he was 11 years old. He specializes in Unity but has experience with Unreal and Godot. In the future he wants to make his own Game Studio. Aside from programming hes a science nerd and loves physics.
